fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At the beginning of the game, a circle of players is made, putting each player next to those directly alphabetically before and after their role. If there is an even number of players in the game, you are not included. A star is made, linking each player with both of the players (n+1)/2 away from them. This star is not changed throughout the game. If a player visits you, they will learn both of the players they are linked with.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have three players visit you and learn the players they are linked with.
